description:
While spawning an instance, Ironic nova driver logs the following warning every time:

2014-04-22 17:23:21.967 15379 WARNING wsme.api [-] Client-side error: Couldn't apply patch '[{'path': '/extra/vif_port_id', 'op': 'remove'}]'. Reason: u'vif_port_id'
title: nova.virt.ironic tries to remove vif_port_id unnecessarily

comments.content:
While spawning an instance, Ironic logs the following warning every time:

2014-04-22 17:23:21.967 15379 WARNING wsme.api [-] Client-side error: Couldn't apply patch '[{'path': '/extra/vif_port_id', 'op': 'remove'}]'. Reason: u'vif_port_id'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~devananda

comments.content:
I would like to work on this bug. How can i reproduce this bug and fix it ? 

Thanks
Manishanker
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~shanker-mani0

comments.content: This cause deploy failures when it occurs - for no good reason breaking the deployment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content: Hi! Per global bugs clean-up, we're unassigning bugs that are without patch and other visible progress for more than 7 days. Please feel free to reassign yourself, set status to In Progress and leave some status comment, if this is wrong. Thank you for understanding!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content: Robert, judging by source code, error you mention is not catched and should no longer break deploy, so I'm setting it back to Low.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content: Hi James, could you provide some reasoning for reopening it against Ironic. Driver is not in our code base, but if you think something is required from our side, please state it (and possibly update the description).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content: Looks like this is fixed already: https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/d3acac0f5bffca59441d9a4a12c89db1d45ec4cf
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jim-rollenhagen
